main event: A bright light was observed for several seconds; it appeared to be rotating or drifting and was not in flight.
interesting points: The sighting was witnessed by 6 or 7 individuals,There was a definite shape to the light observed by all witnesses,Efforts to obtain a copy of the photograph taken were unsuccessful,The light's color changed from year to year around the same time each night,Analysis concluded insufficient data for complete evaluation; object may have been astronomical in nature.
sighted object: a bright light with a definite shape
witness description: Group of individuals who observed the light
